abilities.name: Fey Ancestry.
abilities.description: The drow has advantage on saving throws against being charmed, and magic can't put the drow to sleep.

abilities.name: Innate Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The drow's innate spellcasting ability is Charisma. It can innately cast the following spells, requiring no material components:
* At will: dancing lights
* 1/day each: darkness, faerie fire, levitate (self only)

abilities.name: Spellcasting.
abilities.description:
The drow is a 11th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence. It has the following wizard spells prepared:
* Cantrips (at will): mage hand, message, poison spray, shocking grasp, ray of frost
* 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, mage armor, magic missile, shield
* 2nd level (3 slots): gust of wind, invisibility, misty step, shatter
* 3rd level (3 slots): counterspell, fireball, haste
* 4th level (3 slots): dimension door, Otiluke's resilient sphere
* 5th level (2 slots): cone of cold
* 6th level (1 slot): chain lightning

abilities.name: Sunlight Sensitivity.
abilities.description: While in sunlight, the drow has disadvantage on attack rolls, as well as on Wisdom (Perception) checks that rely on sight.

abilities.name: War Magic.
abilities.description: When the drow uses its action to cast a spell, it can make one weapon attack as a bonus action.
